title: Tutorial
body:
Hello! Press "z" to go to the next dialogue line and/or to choose an option.
Hold "x" to make text scroll faster.
Use the arrow keys to move around.
Use the "Up" and "Down" arrow keys to browse through the options.
Press "e" to interact with appliances and customers!
Good luck! << set $c1S to false >>  << set $c2S to false >> << set $c3S to false >>

title: Customer1
body:
One coffee please!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee1]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks1]]

title: makeDrinks
body:
Would you like to make a drink?
[[ Yes |drinkChoices]] [[ No |No]]

title: makePastries
body:
Would you like to make a pastry?
[[ Yes |pastryChoices]] [[ No |No]]

title: Customer3
body:
Hi!
Just a coffee for me!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee3]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks3]]

title: Customer2
body:
Hi!
I would like a cake please!
[[ (Give cake) |giveCake2]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks2]]

title: cakeMade
body:
<<Cake>>
You made cake!  +1 cake

title: pastryChoices
body:
What pastry would you like to make?
[[ Cake |cakeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: coffeeMade
body:
<<Coffee>>  
You made coffee!    +1 coffee

title: drinkChoices
body:
What drink would you like to make?
[[ Coffee |coffeeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: giveCake2
body:
<<if $cake == true>> 
<<removeCake>>
<< set $c2S to true >>
Thank you for the cake! 
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any cake with you.
<<endif>>

title: thanks3
body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: No
body: Press "z" to exit.

title: Week2intro
body:
New week, new me!
Should be another easy week.

title: introTutorial
body:
Hello! (Press "z" to go to next dialogue line and/or choose an option)
Hold "x" to make text scroll faster.
Use arrow keys to move around.
Press "e" to interact with objects and customers.
And thats pretty much it! Welcome to the game!
 [[Answer:introLore|introLore]]

title: Week4intro
body:
Last week was another busy week.
While I do appreciate the influx of customers and their satisfaction, it is challenging to complete all of the orders.
Maybe it's just the way it is.
Time to start another week.

title: Week3intro
body:
Maybe it was just a busy week last week.
Hopefully this week should be more relaxed.

title: summary1
body:
I was able to complete this week.
I wonder if I can save this cafe.
(Unlocked donuts!)
<<week2>>
[[ Go to next week |week2Load]]

title: week2Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: week4Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: summary3
body:
Maybe managing a cafe isn't for me...
It was just a pipe dream after all...
<<week4>>
[[ Go to next week |week4Load]]

title: summary2
body:
That was a bit more work.
Surely I can save this cafe... right?
(Unlocked tea!)
<<week3>>
[[ Go to next week |week3Load]]

title: week3Load
body: Fast Forwarding to next week...

title: summary4
body:
....
..........
<<endChoices>>
[[ Go to next week |endingLoad]]

title: endingLoad
body: Fast Forwarding to ??? week...

body: Empty Text

title: introLore
body:
You just inherited a cafe!
Before you can re-open, you must first organize and clean the cafe!
Go near the plates, cups, and anything that seems out of the ordinary in order to organize/clean them!
Good Luck!
